alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Latah, northeastern Nez Perce and Lewis Counties through 515 PM PDT... At 441 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kendrick to 13 miles south of Winchester. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, Bovill, Peck, Reubens, Mohler, Helmer, Southwick, Gifford and Lenore. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 268 and 287. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 24 and 36, and mile marker 38 and near mile marker 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
